H0.text: Which internet site was founded in 1999 by Steve and Julie Pankhurst. MySpace

H1.text: Which internet site was founded in 1999 by Steve and Julie Pankhurst. Bebo

H2.text: Which internet site was founded in 1999 by Steve and Julie Pankhurst. LinkedIn

H3.text: Which internet site was founded in 1999 by Steve and Julie Pankhurst. Friendsreunited

A4.text: Bebo was founded by husband-and-wife team Michael and Xochi Birch in January 2005 at their home in San Francisco.

A5.text: The website was conceived by Julie and Steve Pankhurst of Barnet, Hertfordshire and their friend Jason Porter in 1999.
